title: The Amazing Adventures of Hubert Ross: The Spinning Hero
summary: Hubert Ross discovers his superpower at the age of 75, using his spinning skills to save his town and inspire courage amongst its residents.
summaryGerman: Hubert Ross entdeckt seine Superkraft im Alter von 75 Jahren und nutzt seine Spinnfähigkeiten, um seine Stadt zu retten und Mut unter seinen Mitbürgern zu inspirieren.
summaryDutch: Hubert Ross ontdekt zijn superkracht op 75-jarige leeftijd, en gebruikt zijn vaardigheden met spinnen om zijn stad te redden en moed te inspireren bij de bewoners.
summaryFrench: Hubert Ross découvre son superpouvoir à l'âge de 75 ans, utilisant ses compétences de filage pour sauver sa ville et inspirer du courage parmi ses résidents.

story.text: Hubert Ross, a retired coach and avid spinner, begins his week with a morning of peaceful spinning. Little does he know, his spinning wheel grants him unique powers enabling him to control time.
An eerie chill sweeps the town as time starts to behave strangely. Hubert notices his recent spinning session caused the anomaly. With town folk bewildered, only he feels the urge to investigate.
Using his newly discovered powers, Hubert heroically slows time to rescue a child from an oncoming car—his first act as a superhero. The town begins to murmur about their mysterious savior.
Reports of Hubert’s heroics spread like wildfire. The local news picks up on the story, dubbing him 'The Spinning Savior'. Hubert, feeling energetic, vows to use his powers for good.
Hubert spends the day coaching a young team, inspiring them with tales of courage and determination. He realizes his true calling may encompass more than just his new superpowers.
The town faces a new threat as a massive storm approaches. Hubert, now fully in control of his powers, uses his spinning wheel to reroute the storm, saving the town once again.
As the week concludes, Hubert feels a deep sense of fulfillment. The townsfolk gather to thank him. Unbeknownst to them, he spins lightly under the table, ensuring a peaceful end to the day.

ending: And so, Hubert Ross proved that heroes come in all ages, spinning his way into the hearts of everyone.
moral: No matter the age, one can always be a force for good.
